text: rahe momin mard aur momin auraten, ve sab paraspar ek-doosare ke mitr hai. bhalaee ka hukm dete hai aur buraee se rokate hai. namaaz qaayam karate hain, zakaat dete hai aur allaah aur usake rasool ka aagyaapaalan karate hain. ye ve log hai, jinakar sheeghr hee allaah daya karega. nissandeh prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai
